name: Northdoor
overview:
Northdoor provide IT Support, IT Managed Services and IT Outsourcing designed for clients with or without an expert IT support function in-house.

Northdoor support a wide range of IT technologies from major vendors such as Microsoft, Oracle, IBM and VMware.

For clients without an expert IT support function in-house: We provide a fully managed IT service designed for clients who donâ€™t have an expert IT team in-house. This lets our clients focus their energies on running their business with the peace of mind that they are receiving a world class managed IT service.

For clients with an expert IT support function in-house: We provide an IT Support Service designed for clients who have an expert IT team in-house. This lets our clientsâ€™ IT team focus on their core technology areas and provides IT support to them when required. This support may be reactive support when additional expertise or resource is required, or it may be fully managed IT services for selected systems.

IT Project Delivery: We design and deliver a wide variety of IT projects for clients. These can range from technology specific projects, such as upgrading Microsoft Exchange to the latest version, through to large complex projects such as IT demergers where the provision of new systems and the migration of applications and data are required.
